law.history: Repealed 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 105, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 89, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 360, sec. 64, effective July 15, 1982. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554c-10.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Nomination of officers and issuance of certificates designating challengers, witnesses and guards.
